title: The Deep End 5 Volume Bundle
description: The entire story of Dakota Troy and Nicole Parsons in one 5 volume bundle. Save when you buy them all together! You get all 523 pages of drama, laughter, and as always... hot... steamy... sexy situations with the hot... steamy... sexy Dakota Troy. If you don't like good drama and great sex with hot alpha males, you may want to stay in shallower waters... But if you crave all of the above... at a bargain price... Come on it... the water is FINE in The Deep End.
author: Lourie Nolan
